import axios from'axios';const api=axios.create({baseURL:'https://localhost:7238/api',// .NET Core Web API adresin burası olacak
headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});export const fetchCategories=()=>api.get('/category');export const fetchBooks=()=>api.get('/book');// Auth endpoints
export const registerUser=userData=>api.post('/auth/register',userData);export const registerPublisher=publisherData=>api.post('/auth/register-publisher',publisherData);export const loginUser=loginData=>api.post('/auth/login',loginData);// User management endpoints
export const getAllUsers=()=>api.get('/auth');export const getUserById=id=>api.get(`/auth/${id}`);export const getUserByUsername=username=>api.get(`/auth/username/${username}`);export const updateUser=(id,userData)=>api.put(`/auth/${id}`,userData);export const deleteUser=id=>api.delete(`/auth/${id}`);export const getUserCount=()=>api.get('/auth/count');export const getUsersByRole=role=>api.get(`/auth/role/${role}`);// Favorite book endpoints
export const getUserFavorites=userId=>api.get(`/favoritebook/user/${userId}`);export const addToFavorites=userData=>api.post('/favoritebook/add',userData);export const removeFromFavorites=userData=>api.delete('/favoritebook/remove',{data:userData});export const checkIfFavorite=(userId,bookId)=>api.get(`/favoritebook/check/${userId}/${bookId}`);export default api;
